stitches tighten and weave in ends tips  lotion helps keep your fingers from sticking to the roving while making the thrums  make lots and lots of thrums before you start the hand section lots  you can use smaller needles for the ribbed cuffs if you want them tighter  keep your left index finger between your stitches and the thrums on the inside of the mitten to keep the needles from catching on the thrums  pull your stitches tight after knitting second stitch on needle to limit laddering between the needles  to make a larger or smaller size add or subtract stitches in multiples of 4 3
